column1: recession .2  In devising recession scenarios, we draw on many of the same macroeconomic modeling tools used in making monetary policy .
The past two years we have used the adverse scenario to test the impact of a sudden, significant increase in interest rates.
Thus, what may be perceived as a raising of the bar every year is better unders tood as our effort to provide a demanding, but still realistic,  glide path  for firms  to reach that goal .
